name: Stairs to Heaven
description:
Run on the stairs line !
Let's take stick man who is running as far and as high as possible.
This is a very entertaining game. It's very much like a challenge orientation and it is fun when u are really bored.


[How to play]
Use short jump on small size stairs by tapping the short jump button (tap the one with one arrow) on screen.
Use Long jump on big size stairs by tapping the long jump button (press the one with double arrow) on screen.
If failed to jump to stair (appropriate button not used ), stick man will fall down.
How far you can go by running on stairway !?

Jump on appearing stairs, keep jumping up, don't fall in water which are full of hungry sharks, dont step on red tiles or you will fall.

Be careful that it is not as easy as it looks!

Now it’s time to show your reaction and concentration !




if you like the game and want to support us, please write your review. Thank you very much.
